name: 2weeks
description: We specialize in rapidly developing experimental prototypes to identify games that can become breakout hits and durable franchises, and we're working in public to directly involve our audience in the process.
preamble: Making breakout hits on the open web for you and your friends.

name: Adzap
description:
PC & Console gaming is a $90B market, bigger than mobile and growing faster. Steam and other platforms are hitting saturation, yet no “Applovin for PC/Console” has emerged.

On mobile, Applovin became the most valuable company by owning UA. We believe now is the moment to bring that model to PC & Console.

That’s what Adzap is building: the player acquisition platform for PC/Console games. Already live with Unity, UE, and custom engine integrations, and powering top titles from Tier-1 publishers.
preamble: Mobile-grade performance and attribution solution for PC/Console games

name: Agent Astra
description: Agent Astra is an AI-enabled M&A roll-up of logistics providers, starting with asset-light freight forwarding. We’re building the next-generation UPS—delivering a broader range of services with one-tenth the workforce. Our proprietary AI tech is designed to automate operations end-to-end, with the goal of increasing EBITDA margins by 2–3x compared to traditional players.
preamble: We are building the AI enabled UPS

name: Aghanim
description:
Aghanim's core solution is a game hub—a comprehensive community portal and an extension of the mobile game in the browser, full of metagame experiences and personalized offers. Such game hubs are built in less than 30 seconds automatically with the help of genAI and then require minimal integration, making them a no-brainer for studios to integrate and see net revenue uplift. 

Founded in California by ex-Xsolla C-level executives / Harvard Business School alumni with over 40 years expertise in video games and fintech, and backed by top-tier VCs (Bessemer Venture Partners, a16z, P72V, and QED), Aghanim acts as a multinational merchant of record and increases the net revenue of mobile games by up to 110% via its unique Game Hub Builder and LiveOps Builder technologies. 

Aghanim is the first end-to-end DTC enablement platform for mobile games, available as a self-serve platform. It features web-based game hubs and helps studios expand their business beyond app stores.
preamble: Aghanim is an integrated commerce, live-ops automation, community engagement, and payments platform for mobile games.

name: Alpaka Games
description: Alpaka Games is a self-publishing mobile game studio bringing the Rollic business model to the action genre. We’re focused on testing unique core mechanics—some proven, others a mix-and-merge of existing ones—allowing us to refine gameplay quickly without long, costly production cycles.. Our team, with expertise from Rollic and Codeway, focuses on delivering hybrid-casual actions with scalable monetization. Backed by a16z Speedrun, we are building the next generation of mobile hits from the ground up.
preamble: Creating the next generation of hit Action mobile games

name: Ambiguous
description: Ambiguous builds AI coworkers that work like teammates. Our coworkers have real identities (e.g. @oliver, @claire) and work naturally through human interfaces like email, Slack, and Google Docs. They handle everyday operational tasks like scheduling and CRM updates by default, and can run complex playbooks using your SOPs — such as managing customer inquiries and processing refunds. Under the hood, Ambiguous is an agentic operating system designed to plan and execute the low-complexity, high-frequency tasks no one wants to do.
preamble: AI coworkers that work like teammates.

name: Anchr
description: Anchr is building the first network of AI agents for food distributors, automating away manual bottlenecks across their value chains. Our agents automate workflows across functions like order intake, procurement, inventory management and support by integrating into systems and processes already in place.
preamble: The AI Operating System For Food Distributors

name: AndThen
description:
AndThen is a voice-first platform built to spin up daily interactive experiences across genres and repeatable formats. From game shows to mysteries to character-driven stories, every experience is designed to be short, episodic, and replayable. 

Our tech stack supports multi-agent voice interactions and narrative guardrails, allowing us to expand into new game types quickly while keeping conversations coherent, engaging, and fun.

We bring deep experience in media, entertainment, and technology. The founding team includes the former showrunner of The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon alongside leaders in AI and interactive media. That mix gives us unique insight into how to craft formats that people return to every day. Not just experiments, these are repeatable shows and challenges that feel familiar, fun, and scalable.

Our vision is to build the platform for voice-first interactive entertainment at scale. We’re onboarding creators, writers, celebrities, brands, and IP holders to launch new formats on AndThen, and our roadmap includes opening the platform so any user can create and publish their own. 

Think of it as “AI Audio Roblox”... a consumer hub where players come back daily to talk, play, and share conversations that actually do something.
preamble: AndThen is a voice-first platform that makes conversations with AI characters something you do: games, challenges, and episodic stories with real goals.

name: Argu
description:
Existing CCTV video systems are limited to pretrained models and use cases. 
Argu solves that with agentic video intelligence technology, which is operated entirely with words.

We help critical infrastructure and governments to save lives, eliminate tenders and long integration cycles, and gain visibility on what matters.
With Argu, everything is visible now.
preamble:
Create Vision Agents to monitor any scenario in real-time video from CCTV in minutes instead of months.
Zero training. Zero time. Just words.

name: Artifact
description: Artifact deploys custom agents for accounting firms and finance professionals. Our edge is ground breaking accuracy for ledger posting and reconciliation workflows.
preamble: System of intelligence for accounting

name: Atorie
description:
Atorie is the “luxury Temu”— Growing 100% wow, $1.4M in annual run rate. 

We are a marketplace enabling high-end manufacturers to sell directly to consumers. We help factories increase their margins by 100% while giving consumers access to unique goods (Italian leather, cashmere, etc.) at 10–20% of the typical retail price. The platform leverages AI to redefine the manufacturing and e-commerce stack (with merchandising/design agents, AI fashion models, and personal shoppers on the consumer side...).
preamble: Atorie: Luxury Without the Price Tag

name: Atrios
description:
Atrios is building the world’s largest “who knows who” data set for GTM teams.

The Wedge: Warm introductions. Scalable, automated, and incentivized.
 Cash printing machine that wins us data while creating the world's largest decentralized salesforce. (Making hundreds of intros a month right now at an average price of $1,000/intro)


The Data Layer: Over time, Atrios builds the most valuable dataset in B2B: a living graph of relationships, context, and trust signals.


How The Wedge Works:
Companies upload lead lists + bounties they will pay for meetings.
Atrios AI identifies connectors with the right relationships, plus why the intro makes sense.
Connectors earn thousands of dollars by introducing people in their network to companies/products they’ll actually value.


TL;DR: Cold outreach is broken. Warm intros are just the start. 
Atrios is building the relationship data layer that will power the next generation of sales and GTM.
preamble:
Atrios is an AI-powered network intelligence platform that maps who knows who and makes it actionable for go-to-market teams.

 0 to $1M Rev Run Rate in 4 months since beta launch!

name: Autonomous Investing
description:
Autonomous Investing is building a superhuman AI investor—an LLM‑native system that reasons like a world‑class investment analyst, not a black‑box quant.
It ingests vast unstructured signals, forms explainable theses, and acts with disciplined, auditable conviction.
Our vision: institutional‑grade, always‑on research and decisioning for every portfolio.
preamble: Building a superhuman AI investor

name: AvatarOS
description:
We are making digital humans REAL!

The team that built the virtual sensation, Miquela, is back with the best avatar technology in the world.

Miquela is a virtual phenomenon with 50M streams on Spotify, 6M followers on social, and named Time Magazines 25 Most Influential People on the Internet. She has received casting calls for the hottest shows in Hollywood, including HBO's "Euphoria".

But film grade VFX costs up to $3k/second! That's over $10M/hour!

Enter AvatarOS - we generate authentic human avatars that embody the motion, mannerisms, and nuance that make individuals unique with our proprietary 4D/ML tech. 
And because they are dynamically driven by AI, there is NO COST for animation.

Digital Human Avatars are $18B market, projected to reach $500B by 2030

Want to know what countless top brands can't wait to get their hands on? Get in touch!
preamble: Making Digital Humans Real

name: Avenir AI
description:
Employee benefits - the second-largest cost center for employers - are broken.
Confusing and costly for employees and companies, and shockingly manual for brokers.
Legacy systems force people to sift through millions of lines of data across claims, utilization, and regulations.

This is a $1.9T market stuck on manual - Avenir AI automates it.

We built AI agents that deliver immediate savings and smart optimization across plans, vendors, and workflows.
This level of intelligence and speed was not possible before.

We started Avenir a few months ago and have already signed Fortune 500s and top-5 brokers - with $0 in marketing spend.

A big problem needs the best team.
We assembled a world-class, AI-native team from MIT, Apple, and Microsoft - and our traction shows it’s working.

Excited to help disrupt a $1.9T legacy industry?
Email me: maria@avenir.com.ai
preamble: AI Agents for Employee Benefits: the $1.9T market.

name: Axon
description: Axon is a research and trading firm. We have pioneered brain-inspired, low-latency AI for financial markets. Our work advances both the infrastructure that delivers speed and the models that deliver intelligence.
preamble: DeepMind for Finance

name: Azimov
description:
$2.5M annualized revenue  <6 months.

Azimov fused a AAA game engine with multimodal machine learning models to create an engine that brings AI to life. We used this engine to create our first app Otherhalf.ai 
 
Reach us at founders@azimov.ai
preamble: An engine to bring AI to life (2.5M ARR)

name: Bead AI
description:
Auditors spend endless hours on manual tasks: chasing documents, comparing screenshots, and populating excel sheets. Our AI agent handles grunt work, so auditors focus on judgment and strategy – and the business saves 60% of the cost. 

We’re starting with Sarbanes-Oxley Act compliance – audits that cost $2m+/year in salaries for every US listed company.
preamble: Bead is building AI agents for Internal Audit teams, automating repetitive work in a $70B industry.

name: bins
description:
Bins brings a fun-first approach to online shopping through a gamified peer-to-peer marketplace with an emphasis on secondhand.

We aim to put a new thrift shop in our users' pockets each morning, creating a playground of unique & unfiltered styles. In an online world littered with infinite choices, we give users a digestible, comforting sense of finiteness while still putting discovery first.
preamble: making online shopping (actually) fun

name: Blank
description:
AI is the most powerful creative tool ever invented—but using it today is a total nightmare.

Your average user doesn't care which model is being used, what LoRA's are, or have patience to deal with Discord slash commands or complex designs. 

What the last 20 years of social media have taught us is that users want an easy way to create, discover, and share amazing content with friends. 

We’re also quickly learning that the models aren’t the moat. The real value lies in the consumer app that can make AI engaging, social, and accessible to everyone. 

And that’s exactly what we’re here to do. 

Blank makes creating with AI effortless, social, and fun. We package powerful new technologies in a familiar and approachable UI, making AI accessible to anyone.
preamble: Instagram for Generative AI

name: BotBot
description:
At BotBot, we turn AI behavior into a closed-loop growth lever. Right now, behavior is trapped in code; brand, design, marketing, and product teams can’t own the experience. Our partners like Mattel, Bosch, Warner Bros., need a way in. 

BotBot gives them editable behavior (tone, timing, memory, upsells) with instant A/B and telemetry, so each variant maps to conversion, retention, CSAT, and containment. Design, ship to a cohort, read the lift, iterate. Same models, measurably better business results. This is the power of design and UX for AI.
preamble: Aligning AI to brand and outcomes: the UX layer for the AI era.

name: Braid
description: Braid's employee engagement platform focused on brain-boosting games for remote and hybrid teams. Within 3 months of launching over 100 companies are already using Braid to increase their teams' productivity and engagement.
preamble: Boosting employee productivity and engagement with play!

name: Brief
description:
While AI agents can build and ship code at unprecedented speed, they lack the strategic context and product intuition to make meaningful decisions.

Brief provides the missing "intention layer" - giving AI agents business context, user understanding, and institutional memory to make intelligent product trade-offs.
preamble: The AI Chief Product Officer

name: Canto Reality
description: Canto Reality, Inc. is an exploratory deployment lab building social experiences.
preamble: Enabling more dreams to see the light of day.

name: Cheddr
description:
Cheddr is a real-money sports wagering app built for the mass market, legally operating in 46 states—nearly twice as many as DraftKings.

Sports betting is a massive industry, with $150 billion wagered annually in the U.S. A staggering 25% of adults and 82% of all male college students place bets each year. Yet, online sportsbooks are only legal in 25 states, and most platforms exclude players under 21. Existing options tend to be complex often resembling Excel spreadsheets with little social interaction or engagement.

We are building the TikTok of sports wagering—a sportsbook legal in 46 states (about twice as many as DraftKings). We feature an easy to use UI, gamification and live in-game micro betting, which is powered by partnerships with the NFL.

The Cheddr team has 30+ years of combined experience in sweepstakes, skill and real money games. CEO, Jason Krupat is a serial entrepreneur who previously raised funding from Drive by DraftKings for a crypto skill games platform.
preamble: Cheddr is a mass-market sports wagering platform legal in 46 states

name: Chronicler
description: Chronicler is an AI-powered assistant that lives inside messaging apps, using AI agents to transform self-texted notes, reminders, and ideas into an organized, searchable second brain—while also proactively managing tasks, scheduling, and follow-ups to keep you on track.
preamble: What if your self-texts could organize themselves?

name: Circle Games
description:
At Circle Games, we focus on building mobile puzzle games that stand out by design and succeed by execution. We analyze market trends to spot rising mechanics and build around the ones with the highest growth potential—because the market conditions sets the future of the game.

Our philosophy, "details are the product", drives us to perfect every aspect of the player experience. From polished core mechanics to social systems and engaging mini-games, we ensure our games reach the right audience and keep them coming back. We’re here to build games that not only meet market demands but exceed player expectations—delivering long-lasting experiences where every detail matters because both games & players deserve better!
preamble: We're turning potential into perfection!

name: Clementine
description:
We build games where the content and functionality game are modded as you play them. That's the main mechanic!

We built this system to generate functional, reliable code from natural language in real-time. And we are building a monster trainer as a first title.
preamble: Calvinball meets Lovable

name: Clout Kitchen
description:
We empower content creators to be everything, everywhere, all at once by turning them into AI friends that live across your favorite games. 

Our first app, Backseat, is a real-time voice companion for League of Legends. Imagine having the world's biggest streamers, like Tyler1, Emiru, and Jankos, as your gaming buddies -- telling you how to get better and commenting on all the action.

We're a team of creators and serial entrepreneurs, with our founding team also being the founding team behind AcadArena and Proxy Talent. 

Justin (CEO) founded + exited the first Series A gaming company in the Philippines while in college and produced the largest pop culture event in Southeast Asia. Marcel (CBO) was a pioneering League of Legends pro, playing in the 2013 World Championship before starting and exiting one of the first pro player talent agencies.
preamble: Unlocking infinite scale for creators through digital twins. We work with legends like Tyler1, Emiru, and Jankos.

name: Clubs Poker
description: Clubs Poker is an innovative online social poker and casino network that allows users to play their favorite games and win real cash prizes.  Designed for both casual players and high-stakes enthusiasts, our platform leverages innovative technology and engaging social features to drive retention and maximize lifetime value. With a thriving, growing community and a battle-tested team behind it, Clubs Poker is positioned to become the premier online poker destination in the United States.
preamble: Clubs Poker aims to be the largest online poker network in North America

name: Communion
description:
Communion is a new creative entity fusing fashion, games, and emergent tech to create a life matrix — an endless game with infinite scenarios. Altar is the first step.

Based in Venice Beach, CA.
preamble: creating Altar — a social deduction royale.

name: Coverd
description:
On Coverd, users can play for as little as $0.01 to have entire credit card bills or obligations written off. We want to become the best personal finance solution based on game and interaction data.

Reach us at investors@coverd.us
preamble: We disrupt personal finance through gamification, starting by letting people bet against their bills.

name: Coverstar
description: Coverstar is Gen Alpha’s social platform, aiming to become the Disneyland of social networks, providing a safe and positive space for young digital natives to connect and create.
preamble: Gen Alpha’s social platform.

name: Crater Studios
description:
Crater Studios is pioneering a Micro-AAA development model, combining the quality and depth of AAA games with the speed and efficiency of indie studios. By leveraging AI-driven workflows, modular development frameworks, and a data-driven approach to game incubation, we rapidly prototype, test, and launch high-quality games at a fraction of traditional costs. 

Our first title, Dwarven Realms, has proven the model’s success, reaching 150,000+ players and generating $850K in revenue within its first year. With a growing portfolio, including an extractor shooter and a collectible card game, we are building a scalable, interconnected ecosystem of games designed for long-term engagement. 

Backed by top investors such as A16Z Speedrun, Overwolf, Riot’s former CTO Scott Gelb, and CohhCarnage, Crater Studios is redefining how high-quality PC and console games are built, launching faster and more efficiently than ever before.
preamble: Crater Studios is a next-generation game studio pioneering Micro-AAA—delivering high-quality games at rapid speed and a fraction of traditional costs.

name: Creed
description:
Building an AI companion for the 2.4 billion Christians of the world.

In times of uncertainty we look for guidance in institutions we trust. For some of us that's the media, for others it's randomized control studies, and for 64% of Americans that's the Church.  Creed is building the first AI companion rooted in Christian values that learns about you, grows with you,  and helps you connect with your faith.

We launched 8 weeks ago, and have been doubling nearly every week reaching 60k users + best in class retention and positive unit economics.
preamble: AI rooted in Christian values

name: Crema Social
description: Consolidating international gifting/dating marketplace. Our first market entry uses a business model of video call + food delivery for people to virtually get to know each other and enjoy a meal together over live video. Over 1M users have signed up in the past 8 months.
preamble: Redefining international dating one lunch at a time

name: Daedalia
description:
Virtual friends are the next social revolution, and Daedalia is making it real. 
We fuse AAA game tech with emotional AI to craft next-gen companions that look cinematic, act human, and feel alive.

With a proven founder and a high-speed team, Daedalia will bring presence to a billion lives.
preamble: Build bonds with virtual humans.

name: Dare Drop
description: Dare Drop helps game publishers and studios like EA and Focus Entertainment reach and keep their audiences engaged on Twitch, YouTube, and TikTok. Compared to agencies, Dare Drop delivers 4x more views per $ for games, and helps creators grow 3x faster than normal while doing it.
preamble: Dare Drop is a platform to make games go viral on social platforms.

name: Darwin
description: Darwin is building the infrastructure for serving AI-personalized video on the internet. From consumer entertainment to personalized advertising, we power the personalized memory and video generation layer for this new class of content.
preamble: We serve AI-personalized media on the internet

name: DeepPrediction
description:
DeepPrediction is a platform of 200+ vision-first agents that watch users and take action. 
 
The founders are a cracked AI product team with terrifying GTM skills. Liam shipped the first Gemini multimodal LLM at Google, co-founded project Mariner and founded venture backed companies. David lead the computer vision team, and implemented AI technologies at Wayfair. They have been best friends since they were 11 years old.
 
Want to see why more than 250 companies have joined the waitlist and product leaders are dying to get an invite code? Let's talk.
preamble: Watch every user. Predict the future.

name: Definitely Games
description: We're a game studio founded by two award-winning, creative engineers with successful exits and the tech chops to scale anything.
preamble: Building the future of online coop games.

name: Dex
description:
Dex is an AI recruiter and career coach that gets to know candidates well beyond their CV to uncover their ambitions, motivations and deal breakers. He uses that knowledge to match candidates with top-tier tech companies that value the same things, making for more meaningful, long term matches.

But he doesn’t stop at job matching, he’s also a career coach (that’s actually helpful). He promotes self-reflection, guides career planning, company evaluations and even helps prep and practice for interviews. 

For companies, Dex is solving the single biggest challenge in business: hiring. He provides immediate access to exceptional, and often off-market, talent who are more likely to stick.

Ultimately, we believe life is short and should be filled with work that matters.
preamble: The AI tech recruiter that finds the most motivated candidates

name: Dispatcher
description: Software that turns drones into agents capable of real-time decisions
preamble: Agentic Interface for Drones and Robotics

name: Double Dusk
description:
Double Dusk is building character-based 2 player games that combine breakout concepts with viral loops. The gaming market is shifting towards co-op, we will take it to the end game with 2 player experiences designed to last and grow with your friendships.

We’re a team of repeat founders who have built lean venture game studios (Gamelynx), scaled Silicon Valley startups (Freckle), and been in the trenches leading content for billion dollar games (VALORANT, Sky: Children of Light).
preamble: Double Dusk is creating character-based 2 player games to take co-op to its end game

name: DoubleFifth
description:
We are building Plaid for Behavioral Data—a unified API that allows users to selectively grant developers access to their digital data across various other platforms.

We do the difficult work of scraping, building, and maintaining data connectors and transforming disparate data formats into a unified schema, making it immediately useful for developers. Netflix watch history, ride data from Uber, DoorDash order history, or purchase history from Amazon. Everything is cleanly structured and readily accessible.

We enable powerful and novel use cases (quicker onboarding, hyper personalized insights/recommendations, consumer intelligence, etc.).
preamble: Unified API for Behavioral Data

name: Doublespeed
description:
We've built an attention intelligence platform to build and deploy social agents at scale across every demographic and niche. Capturing mindshare on organic social is currently a human labor problem, instead our autonomous creators learn from every interaction, and become more valuable over time driving conversions and engaging with millions 24/7.

One person can now orchestrate what used to take a 30-person creator team and $40,000 at 10% of the cost.
preamble: Automating Attention - Synthetic Creator Infrastructure

name: Dream Voyage
description: Voyage is an AI-driven consumer studio building viral, category-defining products. SINE Daily Manifest, our AI-powered spiritual health app, exploded on TikTok. Vdrop turns social media into a payment network, enabling money transfers with a single tweet. RPS, our Solana-based social game, has racked up 100M+ views on TikTok.
preamble: Building a fun future with AI.

name: Drill Creative, Inc.
description: Drill Creative brings AAA gamedev experience and knowhow to the UGC space, laying the foundation for the future of user generated content. We are currently engaged in building our tech base and developing IP that will that will set the standard for UGC going forward.
preamble: Building innovative and unique UGC experiences as no one else can.

name: Echo Chunk
description:
We're building AI strategy games that generate themselves. We just launched our first game as Launch Partners with Discord and it's been a massive hit.

Echo Chess is doing to chess what pickleball did to tennis.

We believe there’s a huge opportunity for innovating on easy-to-learn, hard-to-master games like chess and open them up to a mass-market audience, and we’ve found the enormous latent demand to be severely underserved.

From grandmasters to grandmas to a whole lot of GenZ fans, our players get obsessed with playing, creating, remixing, and sharing top-tier community UGC with our Playground builder.

If you resonate with our mission, come join us on this journey. And more importantly, have you solved Echo Chess today?

//

Read more about us here:
https://venturebeat.com/games/echo-chunk-raises-1-4m-to-make-ai-based-puzzle-games/
preamble: AI Strategy Games that Generate Themselves. Starting with Echo Chess: the viral "Wordle for Chess"

name: Edgar
description: Edgar is a game engine powered by sweepstakes to bring real money engagement into F2P. Our first step to building this engine is developing the next-gen social casino in partnership with Betty Gaming.
preamble: Bringing real money engagement into F2P via sweepstakes

name: Else
description:
Every customer wants "just one more thing."
With Else, anyone can vibe code full-stack functionality on top of your product in complete isolation.
preamble: Build something Else

name: Elsewhere
description: We make games that feel like an adventure you go on with your friends, and the adventure is never the same twice
preamble: The multiplayer roguelike of your dreams

name: Endo Health
description: Endo Health is building voice as the new emotional engine for healthcare. Glow, our AI voice companion, delivers weight loss coaching through intimate interactions, forming the emotional bonds that drive lasting change. With 50M+ TikTok views, 12000+ minutes of monthly conversation, 2x MoM growth, and 40%+ D7 retention, we're building the front door into healthcare starting with weight loss. Built by a medical doctor, backed by General Catalyst and a16z speedrun.
preamble: Voice as the new emotional engine for healthcare

name: EverCurrent
description: EverCurrent is the first AI-native platform of record to align tools, processes, and knowledge for hardware teams. EverCurrent AI automatically documents the changes across teams, and ties each decision to its wider context. It multiplies the value of the tools, processes, and knowledge hardware teams have — keeping changes recorded, decisions in context, and risks visible.
preamble: Hardware doesn’t stall on ideas; it stalls on scattered knowledge. EverCurrent creates alignment — making the miracles of hardware development repeatable

name: Ex-Human
description:
Ex-Human is the world’s first empathetic AI platform, trained on millions of real conversations to deliver truly human-like interactions. Seamlessly integrating text, images, and video, it creates emotionally intelligent AI companions that engage users in meaningful, personalized ways. 

Powered by proprietary AI technology fine-tuned on real-world interactions, Ex-Human enables businesses to develop AI characters that drive deeper user engagement, boost retention, and increase monetization.

We’ve gained significant traction with $6M ARR, over 1M MAU, 60 B2B clients, and partnerships with companies like Grindr.

Backed by investors like A16Z, Baidu Ventures, JAM Fund and Soma Capital, we're creating a future where empathetic AI companions are an integral part of human life.
preamble: Creating AI with a soul - fun, engaging, and deeply empathetic.

name: Exia Labs
description:
Exia Labs products include:
-Blue: Copilot for Military Operations
-Recon: Intelligence Preparation of the Operational Environment AI Agent
preamble: Master the Science of War

name: Ezra AI Labs
description:
Recruiting today is drowning in noise: AI-written resumes, scripted interviews, and candidates openly cheating with ChatGPT. Ezra was built by recruiters, for recruiters, on two years of R&D in Voice AI to restore the signals that matter—nuance, authenticity, and fairness. We help you find the needles in the haystack at scale, so you stop wasting time on noise and start connecting with the right candidates.

See an interview here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/19O3JPaQocTGwEYxZaMiXANQ6fLqi4_R5/view

Try an interview here: https://app.ezraailabs.tech/interviewFromLinkInvitation/63bc2564-d40f-4335-8234-128e1fac3b28
preamble: Ezra supercharges talent teams with the world’s most intelligent voice AI interviewer

name: Fearn
description:
Current legal AI tools don’t understand the weirdness that is intellectual property (IP) law. For IP, privacy matters in a way not seen in other fields of law. For example, using ChatGPT to write your IP counts as “public disclosure”. This means that by talking about your invention to a public AI, you’ve invalidated the very IP you were trying to file. 

Fearn has developed its own hypercompact foundation models, built and trained especially for IP law and its privacy needs. The nature of our models means we can run our software on almost anything, and deploy in complete privacy. We are IP professionals, building for the needs of IP professionals.
preamble: Fearn is the only compliant AI for drafting intellectual property.

name: Figment
description:
Figment is a studio and technology company that is pioneering an entirely new media format which couldn’t exist before AI — stories that can adapt in real time to become hyper personalized, interactive, and infinite worlds. 

We are building a comprehensive ecosystem for AI-powered interactive storytelling consisting of both a consumer-facing storytelling platform and professional-grade, AI-powered tooling for visuals + narratives. Our social-first consumer platform becomes a content engine where the best stories can be adapted into increasingly higher fidelity media. Our storytelling tools feel like toys, making storytelling a fun and approachable experience through the power of AI.

Our vision is a complete, vertically integrated flywheel, consisting of content, tools, and distribution.

Founded by veterans from Pixar and Epic Games, our world-class team combines deep expertise in AI and gaming with creative talent.
preamble: At Figment, we are creating the end to end ecosystem for telling infinite generative stories.

name: First Day Entertainment
description: We are at the forefront of gaming innovation and dedicated to developing AI-powered games.
preamble: Pioneering AI-powered Games

name: First Voyage
description: First Voyage creates mythological pets that turn wellness into play. By blending AI, gamification, and immersive worldbuilding, we build products people love, and feel deeply connected to. In just two months since launch, our first creature, Momo, has helped users complete over 400,000+ quests -- with a leading category D1 retention of 46%.
preamble: Modern mythologies to help people live healthier, happier lives.

name: Flat2VR Studios
description:
At Flat2VR Studios, we transform beloved flatscreen games into fully immersive VR experiences. From high-octane racing and intense shooters to quirky rhythm games, our mission is to reimagine iconic titles for VR gamers. With roots in the modding community, we’ve adapted over 30 flat games into VR hits, loved by millions.

As a full-service studio, we handle development, funding, publishing and go-to-market strategies, making the shift to VR seamless for our IP partners. Using cutting-edge tools, we adapt games quickly and efficiently, maintaining the highest quality standards.

Our upcoming lineup includes adaptations of favorites like Trombone Champ, FlatOut, and RoboQuest, with many more to follow. Backed by partnerships with Meta, PlayStation, and Steam, and supported by a talented team of VR industry veterans, we’re setting a new standard in immersive gaming.

Join us as we push the boundaries of what’s possible, taking classic games to the next level in virtual reality.
preamble: Transforming your favorite games into immersive VR experiences. Flat2VR Studios brings the classics to life in virtual reality.

name: FLORA
description:
FLORA is Cursor for creatives: the first agentic creative tool that lets you automate your entire creative workflow. FLORA brings the best text, image, and video AI models onto one infinite canvas, letting you concept faster, generate variations instantly, collaborate in real-time, and share generative workflows with clients. 

FLORA is already used by the best visual design agencies in the world such as Pentagram and Franklyn. We're backed by a16z Games, Menlo Ventures, Long Journey Ventures, and angels from Pika, Midjourney, Stability, and Facebook AI Research Lab.
preamble: Cursor for Creatives

name: Gamebeast
description: Gamebeast is a revolutionary low-code LiveOps and data platform tailored for game developers on UGC platforms like Roblox and UEFN.
preamble: Engage Everywhere

name: Genway AI
description:
Genway AI is a market research platform powered by conversational AI agents. We help enterprise software companies and CPG brands unlock customer centricity and gain deep insights at unprecedented speed and scale through qualitative interviews conducted by AI agents. We are generating revenue and working with world-class customers, including 𝐞𝐓𝐨𝐫𝐨, 𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐲𝐭𝐢𝐤𝐚, 𝐍𝐄𝐗𝐓, 𝐔𝐩𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐤, and others.

As a Team, Genway brings together over 40 years of technological Know-How in the field of Conversational AI and Data Analysis from 𝐄𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐧𝐨𝐥𝐨𝐠𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥 𝐔𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐞𝐬 𝐚𝐭 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐈𝐬𝐫𝐚𝐞𝐥𝐢 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐥𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐫𝐩 (Matzov, 8200, Matzpen).
preamble: Conversational AI Agents for User Interviews

name: GG Folks
description: GGFolks was formed to build Puzzle Wizards (early access) and future new MMOs across Steam, iOS, Android and other platforms.  The team built and helps operate Puzzle Pirates (2003) and Spiral Knights (2011), older MMOs with active communities. With the exception of speedrun's investment, GGFolks is founder funded.
preamble: GGFolks creates and operates x-platform cult MMOs Puzzle Pirates, Spiral Knights, Puzzle Wizards and more, coming soon!

name: Ghosted
description:
As the world becomes increasingly artificial, we're building a fortress of realness where you can meet new people and make connections. 

- No-filter: using AI, we enforce a strict "authentic & natural picture"-only policy.
- Stories not profiles: profiles and feeds are dynamic, like you.
- Transparency: we give users access to all their story views, likes and replays.

We have 50,000 genZ users, 20% D30 retention, 1 million profile views / month.
preamble: Ghosted is a no-filter dating app for GenZ.

name: Glyf
description:
Glyf is the ultimate assistant for motion designers, studios, and creative teams looking to transform their animations into production-ready, stylized assets.

In just minutes you can transform your 2D animations into 3D with custom textures / effects, enhance live action footage, or custom train bespoke AI models to match your unique artistic style & direction.
preamble: AI Effects for Motion Graphics

name: Greathorn Games
description: Greathorn is a game studio focused on making great games that build inter-player relationships and communities by getting people to talk to one another during play. Our games feature uniquely social game mechanics that drive conversation about tactics and strategy, while also encouraging community formation through deep and innovative integrations with Discord and other community platforms.
preamble: We create socially-driven multiplayer games for PC and Consoles, blending exciting action with conversation-generating mechanics.

name: Gridsnap
description:
Gridsnap is a game studio leveraging the power of Unreal Editor for Fortnite (UEFN) to create innovative experiences within the Fortnite ecosystem. 

We develop our own unique IP while also partnering with influencers to build dedicated spaces for their communities on the platform. 

Additionally, Gridsnap supports up-and-coming developers by acquiring a stake in their games in exchange for hands-on development assistance.
preamble: Interactive worlds, built for community, powered by UGC.

name: Hedra
description: Hedra is an AI native platform for multimodal creation. The platform is built around their own cutting-edge proprietary video model, Character-3, which is the first multimodal model in production. Alongside Character-3, the platform also brings other leading foundation models into one ecosystem spanning generative images, video, and audio. Prosumer and enterprise users leverage Hedra to generate content ranging from viral social media to branded content marketing.
preamble: A generative media company building the AI-native creation platform around the world's first omnimodal foundation model.

name: Hooper
description:
AI is the new GPS: Just like how Strava leveraged GPS in phones to serve runners, Hooper is using video AI to empower athletes in basketball and other sports on the consumer-level. To get stats and highlights for a game, it’s now 100x cheaper and 10x faster.

Vision: Open the access to pro-level training & storytelling to every athlete. The app today comes with stats, mixtapes, medals, and leaderboards, spurring comparison and competition.

High retention: In the beta, users have shown that they love the product. The industry average of users returning to the app after 30 days is 8%. Hooper's is 38%. They continue to come back while also inviting those they play with, and sharing their content online.
preamble: Hooper uses AI to generate highlights, stats, and the stories on the court that make everyone feel like a pro — all with just a phone.

name: Househunt
description: Guess house prices, buy fix and flip homes to build your dream real estate empire
preamble: Monopoly with real houses

name: Human Computer
description: Human Computer is a ground-breaking gaming studio founded by Alex Schleifer and Eliot Garcia Weisberg, aiming to revolutionize the industry with innovative, story-driven games within a shared universe. Our goal is to become the world's premier triple-I studio, built on highly versatile original IP and unparalleled production values.
preamble: Building the world's greatest triple-I game studio.

name: Incite Interactive
description: Incite is an AI-Native Gaming Studio creating the world's first Agentic Life Simulation Game, AuraVale. The team is led by industry veterans from Zynga, The Sims, and Roblox, and are backed by a16z’s Speedrun, Earthling VC, and a stellar cast of gaming industry leaders.
preamble: Makers of AuraVale, an agentic life simulation where your words shape your story.

name: Intangible
description:
Intangible is a generative AI startup that makes creating and communicating in 3D dramatically simpler than current industry tools - a “Canva for 3D”

Intangible was founded by industry veterans in 3D — design luminary Charles Migos, and repeat tech founder Bharat Vasan, with a team of technologists from Apple, Pixar, Unity, EA, ILM, Spotify and NASA.

At the heart of Intangible’s approach is Intangible OS – a new technical approach to building an AI system that can understand human concepts for 3D, through a combination of LLMs, proprietary knowledge graphs, and a world model. 

The result is Intangible Studio – a 3D creative tool that is powerful and easy to use by creatives of all abilities in film, games, marketing and agencies. Intangible enables ultra-fast world creation in 3D, precision camera controls, high-quality visuals, and seamless collaboration — all at a fraction of the cost and complexity of industry standard tools.

Watch the demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JbVQ
preamble: Intangible is the world's simplest 3D creative tool.

name: Jigsaw
description:
Jigsaw gives businesses the power of an entire marketing team at the speed of prompt.

Through a visual, prompt-first canvas, our agents orchestrate personalized growth campaigns to scale distribution through content, leveraging today’s leading GTM tools while adapting to tomorrow’s. 

We’re already working with the fastest-growing startups, leading DTC brands, and top GTM agencies to accelerate their growth at scale.
preamble: The agentic canvas for GTM and distribution.

name: Jooba
description:
Jooba is using AI to automate the $900B+ recruiting services market. We start by forward deploying into teams like Ramp and using AI Agents to automate their recruiting pipeline.

Our founders have shipped software to millions at Netflix and Figma, built agents at Essential AI and Resolve AI, co-authored papers on LLM reasoning, spent months shadowing a major recruiting agency, and built one of the fastest growing LinkedIn accounts in the world (in recruiting).

We kicked off design partnerships just 5 weeks ago and already have $350k+ in revenue backlog. You can see what they have to say below.
preamble: The world's first autonomous recruiting firm

name: Kanu AI
description:
An AI agent that builds production-ready cloud-native applications from natural language.

Real software is built on the cloud, not in sandboxes. Our AI agent builds on top of your existing cloud infrastructure, taking your roadmap from prompt to production. Unlike a traditional engineer, Kanu operates at 10x velocity for 1/10th the cost. Just as companies adopted the cloud, they will adopt Kanu AI as their default engineer.
preamble: The worlds first enterprise grade AI engineer that takes your company's roadmap from prompt to production.

name: Keewano
description: Keewano uses AI and Proprietary high-speed database technologies to spotlights in-game user usage patterns, visualizes their journeys, and suggests actionable items for improvement. While analytics tools show you game statistics, Keewano deep dives into the user’s path within your game and gives you the tools to observe your game holistically.
preamble: World's first AI-product manager assistant for gaming & beyond

name: k-ID
description: k-ID is transforming the way kids and teens access age-appropriate game experiences while helping developers comply with complex global regulations in over 200 markets with a first-of-its-kind, comprehensive platform that makes online platforms safer, better, faster, and more empowering for young players.
preamble: It’s not about telling kids what they can’t do – it’s about giving them the right tools to discover what they can

name: Kintow
description:
Kintow helps restaurants become more profitable. 

Kintow monitors food and labor costs and uses AI to help them improve: recommending what to change and automating core workflows.
preamble: The AI copilot for modern restaurants.

name: Kitbash
description:
We're pioneering the best way to make games by creating Kitbash, our new game engine and platform. Using Kitbash, anyone can create compelling 2D games right in the browser by building and remixing their favorite experiences with the help of powerful AI tooling.

As we build the platform, we're using Kitbash to build our own games as well, starting with Wyld Land, our 2D Bullet Hell MMO that's launching on the web and Steam later this year.
preamble: AI powered remixing to unlock the gamedev in everyone.

name: Labyrinth
description:
Labyrinth is an early stage startup founded by Neil Garde, seasoned Google PM, and James Sha, AI researcher and Co-founder / CTO of Onyx (acq. by Curefit).

We are currently in stealth, building an AI-powered vertical SaaS application that leverages recent advancements in AI to solve complex, high-impact problems.
preamble: Building AI-native Vertical SaaS

name: Layerpath
description:
Layerpath is transforming the broken 'Book a Demo' process with AI Demo Agents that deliver instant, personalized product experiences 24/7.

Our AI-first platform combines three key components: a Demo Snippet Manager that creates problem-solution-benefit video snippets; a Product Info Repository that ingests docs, pricing, and support details; and AI Demo Agents that orchestrate perfect demos tailored to each prospect's industry, role, and pain points.

With 8,000+ signups and 1,000 active customers since our beta launch, we're already seeing dramatic results: 2x pipeline growth, 33% faster sales cycles, and 95% lower demo costs ($2 vs. $40-50 per demo).

Backed by a16z speedrun and Jason Calacanis, we're building the foundation for the next generation of enterprise revenue systems, starting with the critical moment when awareness becomes consideration.
preamble: AI Demo Agents that convert prospects into revenue. What Gong did for bottom-of-funnel, we're doing for top-of-funnel, where the impact is even greater.

name: Legion
description: The official developers behind Covenant, a first-person mythical action game, set in a dark fantasy world.
preamble: Greater Things are Coming...

name: Lekondo
description:
Lekondo builds a living world model of taste from everyday #OOTD posts. Fashion is now a bottom‑up signal—messy, fragmented, and fast—so we structure it into an aesthetic‑temporal graph of people, contexts, items, combinations, and outcomes.

On that substrate, our product is the expression agent. Consumers explore, remix, and virtually "try on" looks, while brands and AI tap real‑time culture signal and APIs. The closed loop from share → try → buy compounds the model, making both the app and the terminal smarter every day. Grounded in what we already ship—indexing #OOTD into a live taste graph—we’re building the general intuition for human expression.
preamble: Lekondo: "General Intuition" for Human Expression

name: Level Headed Games
description:
Having worked with multiple billion-dollar franchises, our team is using our expertise to make break-out multiplayer games for the underserved Gen Z and cross-generational markets.

We have big ambitions, but we don’t need to burn through tens of millions to make an awesome game. We are well-connected and resourceful, and get the most out of every dollar we spend.

Our first game, Whimpact! (announce coming soon), brings the repeatable fun of joyful arena party games like Fall Guys or Mario Kart, and adds long term player progression thanks to your collection of adorable creatures called Whims. When you take your Whims as companions, they imbue you with super powers. As you tend to them and level them up, you get stronger. The more you care, the better you play!
preamble: Leading the Triple I revolution as we reinvent online multiplayer for the gaming habits of tomorrow.

name: LFG
description: At LFG we have a strong conviction that studios building on UGC platforms have been executing wrong. We're a team that deeply understand how to make top games on these platforms and to do so in an aggressive, fast & capital efficient manner.
preamble: The Hit Factory Building the Biggest Games for Gen Alpha

name: Lil Snack
description: Lil Snack is The DAILY Games Company, making play a daily routine. We deliver new bite-sized games every day, tied to pop culture moments and trends. Play on the web and across partner experiences on Amazon Prime, Peacock, BuzzFeed, Imgur and more. Come back daily for fresh themes, and track your streak, collect wins, while having a lil fun with our community of daily players.
preamble: The DAILY Games Company—making play a daily routine.

name: Limy AI
description:
Limy puts brands in control of agent interactions in the agentic web.

In just six months, we’ve scaled to over $1.2M ARR, working with Fortune 500 companies, P&G brands, large automotive brands, the biggest media groups in the US, and some of the world’s most influential brands. 

Recently launched our self serve and have seen over 70 sign ups in 6 hours.
preamble: Limy puts brands in control of agent interactions in the agentic web.

name: Little Umbrella
description:
A tech-driven game studio and publisher behind the #1 social AI game on Discord, 'Death by AI,' which reached 20 million players in just 3 months. 

Launching 3 new social AI games in next 12 months. The next wave of social gaming is coming and we are leading it.
preamble: Social AI Games for next generation!

name: LIVE AWARE
description:
Live Aware transforms game development by eliminating feedback silos—automating the ingestion and analysis of data, and enabling teams to take action quickly. Every day, developer teams and their trusted communities use Live Aware to capture game sessions and capture their detailed and nuanced thoughts in real time as they explore new builds and features.

Live Aware’s AI automatically consolidates feedback by organizing, tagging, and surfacing actionable insights to help teams identify trending issues, surface critical bugs, and link them to real gameplay footage for immediate action. Integrating directly with the tools developers already use—like Jira, Unity, Unreal, and Discord—teams are now able to identify issues, prioritize fixes, and iterate faster without disrupting workflow.
preamble: Your unified source of truth for game changing insights

name: Loan Labs
description:
If you’ve ever taken out a mortgage and been asked for the same document again and again, you’ve felt a symptom of a chronic disease plaguing the mortgage industry: outdated software and broken workflows layered on top of it.

Behind every loan application is an army of humans manually reviewing documents, extracting data, and comparing inconsistencies across scattered systems—email, CRMs, POS and LOS platforms, file management systems, and more. This fragmentation leads to delays, lost information, and costly errors.

At Loan Labs, we’re building AI workers to fix this—starting with LOIS, our AI loan processing assistant. LOIS collects documents, assembles files, reviews key information, extracts structured data, and surfaces issues to salespeople, processors, and underwriters—so they can focus on high-value work and close more loans with less risk.

LOIS is just the beginning. Once she becomes the system of record for loan information, she’ll expand into underwriting, closing, finance, and capital markets—replacing human driven workflows with intelligent, scalable infrastructure for the next generation of mortgage companies.
preamble:
We're building agentic workers for mortgage companies. 

We liberate humans from having to do soul-crushing work. When we liberate the humans, the industry will prosper.

name: Logical Health
description:
Logical Health is on a mission to reclaim $500B (2% of the US GDP) in avoidable healthcare waste by transforming how insurance policies are structured and interacted with. 

To do this, we spun out of a Stanford Research Lab and formed Logical Health. We are a team of health professionals, Stanford MBAs, Google and Meta tech leads. We even have a former CEO of Blue Cross Blue Shield as one of our advisors. 

Our unique insight is to ground AI with a math rules engine to produce fast and precise insurance coverage answers. We have a proprietary system to produce this math engine by converting health insurance policies using declarative programming.  If this sounds complicated, feel free to ping us to learn more. This tech is proven to work and already saved one of the largest insurers $16M/year.

Our wedge into the massive healthcare market is customer service. Next, we’ll bring the same high-precision coverage answers to prior authorization, claims processing, and plan design.
preamble: Bringing transparency to health insurance

name: Luvu
description:
Luvu has 100,000 users sticking to their hard habits - like fitness, reflection, & addictions, with retention that is already unprecedented in the sector. But we're just getting started.

Luvu is the first app that tailors every part of your experience - notifications, copy, screens, widgets, sounds everything - uniquely for you to maximize your odds of coming back and sticking with your habit. We are unlocking a new category of ultra-personalization beyond prompts / agentic memory that is only now becoming possible with the bleeding edge of reinforcement learning using next-day retention signals.
Ex-Duolingo + Ex-Tiktok + AI Research
preamble: Your retention-obsessed accountability buddy

name: Magic Circle
description: 1M+ players, playable directly inside Discord & on the web. Players use AI remix our games to make them hilariously relevant to their friend group's niche humor and inside jokes.
preamble: Magic Circle uses AI to create games for best friends to play together.

name: Maniac
description: Category leaders own their AI models, unlocking deep customization, cost optimization, and data provenance. Pioneer, by Maniac,  democratizes this power, swapping third-party vendors for proprietary, SoTA, task-specific models at enterprise scale. You plug in your live inference, evaluators, and post-training tools, and we orchestrate your model layer. With Maniac, every interaction with the AI layer is your Intellectual Property.
preamble: Pareto-Optimal AI at Scale, for Enterprise Intelligence You Own.

name: Manifest
description: Manifest is a Gen Z mental health app that builds emotional wellness for our users through daily challenges that transform self-care into a rewarding and habitual experience.
preamble: Gen Z mental health. 15.8 million manifestations since the start of Speedrun.

name: Mara
description:
Mara builds autonomous, short-range, AI-powered robotic defense systems. Our first product is Spike: a dirt-cheap air defense system which protects military equipment & critical infrastructure from simultaneous attack by dozens of jam-proof enemy drones. Unlike traditional cUAS, which is slow, expensive, and centralized, our system is fast, distributed, and built for frontline deployment.

What makes us different? We train our autonomy in a video game—combining simulation-driven AI with player data to develop constantly adapting tactics.
preamble: Building a horde of tactical robots trained on gameplay. Starting with Spike: a swarming anti-drone system defending high-value targets.

name: Margin
description:
Margin understands customer behavior in ways never before possible, enabling brands to offer precisely targeted rewards and creating new revenue opportunities. Customers earn points, with dynamic rewards that adapt to their preferences in real time.

Built with AI, Margin enables experiences that traditional financial institutions cannot replicate. Premium brand partners are choosing Margin to create deeper customer relationships.

From daily spending to mortgages, Margin is building the AI platform to power the future of personalized consumer credit.
preamble: The world's first AI powered credit card.

name: Marlo
description:
Built for talent agencies and digital creators, Marlo is the agentic operating system of the creator economy.

Marlo, our AI partner sits on inboxes & social DMs to put creator brand deals on autopilot. Marlo sorts inbound, drafts responses, & builds a knowledge base 24/7. We make sure that creators never miss a brand deal or opportunity and enable them to focus on what matters most, creating & pushing culture.

Brands, talent agencies, & creators are reacting. We've already handled more than 500K inbound opportunities across thousands brand deals for some of the largest managers and creators in the world.

For the first time, AI can turn manual, unstructured tasks into programmatic workflows for agencies and creators. Our customers are already asking for our AI partner to take on everything: creator CRM, outbound pitching, affiliates, social commerce, and more.
preamble: Strike 'brand deal' gold in your inbox.

name: Matchday
description:
Our mission is to connect soccer's 5 billion fans. 

We have secured world class IP, including 65K officially licensed soccer players from FIFPRO, the global player union. 

Our first game is Matchday Champions, the only casual soccer game on the market. The game is charting app stores in Europe, with top retention and monetization metrics in key cohorts. Champions is the first step in achieving our vision of building the Roblox for soccer. 

We are a team of seasoned founders (combined exits > $1B), gaming veterans (EA, King, Glu), and Leo Messi.


https://m.day/get-champions
preamble: We are building the home of interactive entertainment for 5 billion soccer fans.

name: Messengage.ai
description: We are building a solution to enable gaming publishers to drive direct purchases through WhatsApp messaging, and building long-term relationships with their most valuable players. The founding team, which spun out of Meta, has a deep understanding of the dynamics of messaging and commerce through this channel.
preamble: Pioneering Conversational Commerce in gaming through social messaging.

name: Metal
description: Metal provides an end-to-end operating system for fundraising. Equipped with industry data and the user's Company context, the platform brings efficiency and intelligence to key workflows involved in the fundraising process.
preamble: Super intelligence for fundraising

name: Metro Labs
description: Metro Labs Inc. is an entertainment company built from the ground up with AI. We're building a multi-modal AI model focused on creativity, powering Backlot, a platform where fans can co-create with our IP.
preamble: Building the Pixar of AI.

name: Mini Studio
description: We’re creating AI-animated, emotionally and story rich animated films that millions of kids and families will remember forever.
preamble: ✨ An AI Native animation & edutainment studio creating the global franchises of tomorrow.

name: Moescape
description: Moescape is the leading UGC platform for anime fans. In one place, users design characters, turn them into images and videos, give them voices, and actually chat with them. Fans don’t just make content here, they build universes together. That’s what makes Moescape different.
preamble: The only limit is your imagination.

name: Moku
description:
Moku is providing game developers with a launch pad and distribution platform, to show off their game and get users in early who are incentive aligned and willing to pay for tradeable assets.

Game developers can now go from MVP to getting their first dollar, in less than 5 minutes.
preamble: We help bring games to market in web3

name: Moona Health
description:
Better sleep is now recognized as essential to maintain physical and mental health. Yet 1 in 3 Americans struggles to sleep. Wearables and pills don't work. CBT-I, is a drug-free, highly effective treatment that is now covered by insurance for 90% of Americans. 

Moona is building the largest virtual network of CBT-I therapists, accepting insurance. Our AI-powered platform automates insurance claims and scheduling and analyzes sleep data –  providing personalized session guidelines to therapists.

Partnering with leading health systems. Growing 40% MoM, without spending a dollar on ads.

Repeat healthtech founders with 1 exit; CTO from Polytechnique; Clinical Officer (PhD) led the VA’s insomnia program.
preamble: AI-powered sleep care, covered by insurance.

name: Nativ
description:
Nativ enables businesses to expand globally by using AI to culturally adapt visual content for different markets. From marketing materials to product visuals, our technology ensures that images, videos, and graphics resonate with local audiences, going beyond simple translation to embrace cultural nuance. By making content feel truly native in every region, we enable brands to connect authentically with new customers and unlock growth in untapped markets.

We have grown from 0 to $100K ARR in 3 months, working with 5 partners. We've already unlocked over a billion new users for our customers.
preamble: We use AI to transform visual content for every culture, unlocking global markets.

name: Neon Commerce
description:
Neon's mission is to accelerate the games industry’s shift from a platform oligopoly to a competitive ecosystem by helping every game creator become an enduring brand.

Neon's first product is a white-label e-commerce and global merchant of record platform that lets game teams complement app store monetization with their own DTC channel. Today, Neon partners with a range of mobile and PC studios to help them generate 15-35% of their total revenue through direct.

Neon's team comes from Affirm, Supercell, Unity, Square, Netflix, Visa, Meta, Etsy, and more, and is backed by Thrive Capital, Ribbit Capital, SciFi, a16z Games, Griffin Gaming Partners, and Renegade. 

Neon's headquarters is in San Francisco, with offices in New York City and London.
preamble: Developers use Neon's payments and commerce software to monetize their games direct-to-consumer to earn more revenue and own their player relationships.

name: Neon Wild
description: Neon Wild are personalized interactive story worlds designed to boost a child's confidence and self-esteem. Featuring the hit DreamWorks property, Gabby's Dollhouse!
preamble: Where any child, anywhere in the world can become a hero.

name: Nexad
description: We generate context-aware ads in real time, and put them into chatbots, AI search engines, and other AI apps.
preamble: Native ads system for AI apps

name: Nexxa.ai
description: Nexxa.ai is building Agentic AI for industrial engineering. 0 to 980K in 9 months. 3x every quarter. Our intelligent agents integrate with legacy systems and complex workflows to help heavy industry companies automate critical engineering and operational processes. With a 100% activation rate on all projects and rapidly growing contracted revenue, Nexxa is redefining how industrial enterprises deploy AI in mission-critical environments.
preamble: Specialized AI for Heavy Industries

name: Nilo Technologies
description:
Nilo enables players to create 3D worlds in seconds.

Nilo is a social, generative AI-native 3D sandbox that runs in the browser (desktop, mobile, Discord, Telegram).
With Nilo, Generation Alpha has fun creating and sharing 3D experiences together.

Founded in April 2024, Nilo is backed by A16Z Speedrun, Essence VC, Earthling VC, Andreas Klinger and Logan Kilpatrick and recently won the most creative award at SF Demo Day hosted by Product Hunt.

Nuno, the founder, spent 15 years building game engines,  including Unreal Engine 5 and Fortnite at Epic Games.

The rest of the Nilo team helped build leading 3D experiences such as World of Warcraft, Avatar and Star Wars at companies such as Blizzard, Microsoft, Adobe and Snapchat.

3D UGC creators earned 1.35B in 2024 alone.
Nilo unlocks a new wave of 3D creators that vibe codes together, generates content in seconds, and shares it instantly.

Curious? Come create with us :)
preamble: Creating 3D worlds in seconds

name: NoMi
description:
Tapping into a $90B market by doing for self-development what Headspace and Calm have done for mindfulness. We strip away the formality and inaccessibility of self-help, transforming the experience into a fun and rewarding journey of personal growth.

NoMi takes relatable Gen-Z experiences and turns them into playable games,  helping to look at things from different perspectives so that we can challenge your negative thoughts and build up your confidence. 

Everyone receive's personalized advice on ways to improve for the future, making self-help fun, easy and accessible.
preamble: NoMi gives you the end result of therapy and all you have to do is play a game.

name: nunu.ai
description:
nunu.ai is building intelligent agents to test and play games. We infuse AI agents into the game development process, from QA all the way to player simulation. 

Our vision is to develop generally capable agents that can navigate and act in any given 3D environment, starting with applications in gaming and moving towards general 3D simulations and robotics.
preamble: creating unembodied minds

name: Ocoder
description: Beyond simple vibe coding — Ocoder is a communication tool that helps non-technicals build on top of real codebases and share ideas with engineers, VPs and others within their company. New features can be built cheaply, and getting feedback is easy with share links.
preamble: AI-powered dev environment for designers and PMs

name: Oleum
description:
The Oleum team is a group of former Bridgewater quants,  building AI tools that help data users better understand and interact with external datasets. Trialing a single dataset currently takes months, and most firms spend millions each year doing this by hand. 

We automate the process of cleaning, structuring, and testing datasets, so customers can evaluate hundreds of sources at once and find valuable insights faster.

Our long-term vision is to become the ubiquitous data infrastructure layer for all data-oriented businesses.
preamble: An AI platform that helps companies utilize external data faster

name: OpenSesame
description:
OpenSesame is building the fastest path for software companies to become entirely AI-native, turning any product’s existing APIs into a dedicated customer-facing AI agent. For decades, software interfaces have remained essentially unchanged; they are one-size-fits-all, failing to address the unique needs of each user. 

Today, legacy, more established software companies are facing pressure from their boards, investors, customers, and the media to incorporate AI into their products. However, long implementation timelines, rising AI talent costs, and outdated infrastructure are hindering their ability to reinvent themselves for the AI age.

OpenSesame solves this by providing companies with an AI-native interface that they can embed within their existing software products, enabling their end customers to perform all their work using natural language across the entire product offering.
preamble: Turning Legacy Software AI-Native in Days, Not Quarters.

name: Original Games
description: At Original, you can find MZ, Wooga, Playgendary, Playrix, EA alumni (And more!), who are working on casual games that perfectly merge universal accessibility and deep engagement. Our teams make the best possible decisions for our games and the players.
preamble: Creative & Curious & Universal - Building the future of mobile casual gaming!

name: Outcome
description:
To help bigger companies move at startup speed.

TeamOS facilitates day-to-day coordination, collects data on how teams depend on others, and combines it with data from existing collaboration tools (e.g. Jira, Github, calendars, etc.) in a single knowledge graph. This enables its AI consultants to learn and recommend what to change in teams, processes, ownership or priorities to eliminate collaboration bottlenecks.

We make continuous improvement inevitable.
preamble: Building TeamOS, an AI-powered team collaboration platform

name: Parhelion
description: Parhelion is a game studio focused on revolutionizing the anime media space through games and technology. We  specialize in live service anime games and AI technology to enhance asset production and revolutionize 2D animation.
preamble: Revolutionize anime through games and technology.

name: Pelago
description: Pelago builds voice-first AI wellness apps that solve adherence: the hardest problem in health.
preamble: Voice-First AI apps that deliver real life wellness outcomes

name: Pencil.dev
description:
VIDEO: https://x.com/tomkrcha/status/1973033971010449696

Design right where you code. No more design handoffs.
Pencil is agent driven MCP canvas built around open design format that lives in your codebase. It works with Cursor, Claude Code, VSCode, OpenAI Codex, etc.
preamble: AI designer for every engineer

name: Plots
description: Plots is an event discovery platform that connects Gen Z to high quality local events and makes it easier to form in person connections with the people attending those events.
preamble: The world's in-person social network.

name: Plutus Labs
description: Plutus is a one-stop platform enabling UGC and AI generated prediction markets & hyper-casual games with branded rewards. Home to over 1.4mn+ users globally.
preamble: Fastest growing creator led social gaming platform

name: Prepp
description: We develop student- and educator-focused modules that solve both administrative and content-driven issues from material generation, automatic grading, attendance, and student engagement.
preamble: Reimagining global EdTech, one module at a time.

name: Presia
description:
We build AI agents to automate the $1Tn wasted on manual work in management consulting, so consultants can focus on problem solving and collaboration.

We founded Presia 3 months ago and we are now at $270k ARR. We’re already working with globally recognized enterprises and signing a new consultancy every week. We're ex-MBB consultants, Jane Street Alumni and Cambridge AI researchers, with angel backing by senior partners from top consultancies.
preamble: AI agents for management consulting. Started 3 months ago - $270k ARR.

name: Qloud Games (Loftia)
description: We're building Loftia: a cozy social MMO aimed at providing players with a solace from their real life stressors and troubles, instilling a sense of hope and positivity for the future.
preamble: Building a new-age, solarpunk-inspired cozy game x social experience!

name: Quago
description: Quago provides gaming studios with a deeper layer of player insights by analyzing sensor data and player connectivity. Powered by machine learning, our technology detects in-game cheaters and identifies fake traffic in UA campaigns in real time - uncovering behaviors that traditional tools and MMPs miss. With high-confidence detection, our AAA studio customers and other leading game developers can take targeted action, safeguard revenue, optimize UA spend, and ensure their data reflects real player activity at scale.
preamble: Quago sees what others don’t. By analyzing sensor data and player connectivity, we detect in-game cheaters and expose fake players inflating UA campaigns.

name: Rascal Games
description: We're making the next digital 3rd place where gamers can build a new identity, go on adventures with friends, and be valued by them for years to come.
preamble: Go on adventures with your friends.

name: Ray Browser
description: Next-generation gaming browser. Instantly play the best games with no downloads required. Enjoy the smoothest gameplay and keep all your favorite apps at your fingertips with split-screen.
preamble: The Only Browser Built For Gaming

name: Refactor Games
description:
Based in Santa Monica, CA.

We are the creators of action packed next-generation sports video games.

Our Sports Physics Engine creates new unique animations every frame, so that every play is different.

Our games are cross-platform, penetrating 100% of the video game market.

We have well established relationships with every sports license holder and every major video game platform or distributor.

It is our mission to expand the sports video game market and to bring exceptional returns to shareholders, platforms, leagues, athletes and game developers.
preamble: Next-generation sports video games

name: Rivet
description: Rivet is an open-source platform for building AI agents, multiplayer applications, and real-time backends—without managing infrastructure. Scale instantly, persist state effortlessly, and integrate with your existing stack in minutes.
preamble: Build Real-Time, Stateful Applications Without Servers

name: Rork
description:
Turn your ideas into real mobile apps in minutes

Rork is the app that builds mobile apps. Prototype & share real native apps, on your phone or desktop.

0 -> $2.5M ARR in 6 months (#1 in category)

Build something you want with Rork now
preamble: Lovable for mobile apps. #1 in text-to-mobile category

name: Rosebud
description: Rosebud AI lets no code creators vibe code games. We have over 500K games already made on our platform.
preamble: Vibe Code Games

name: RUNREAL
description:
RUNREAL accelerates game development with cutting-edge tools designed to supercharge developer workflows. 

Our CICD platform allows you to easily build, test, and deploy your game on any device, accelerating development cycles and ensuring cross-platform compatibility.

RUNREAL proactively monitors the health of your development process by leveraging our unique bare metal cloud infrastructure, providing real-time insights and early detection of potential issues.
preamble: Accelerate Game Development with RUNREAL

name: Runware
description:
Runware offers the fastest, most cost-efficient unified API for AI media generation, enabling sub-second creation across images, audio, video, and more.

Powered by custom, renewable-energy hardware, it delivers 5–10× lower costs with no infrastructure or machine-learning expertise required.
preamble: Flexible generative AI for image and video.

name: Sans Strings Studio
description:
Sans Strings Studio is a first-of-its-kind tech-augmented transmedia studio operating at the convergence of gaming, film, social, and live events. Using real-time technology, we co-produce and develop properties seamlessly across interactive, linear, and live formats.

Our non-linear, scalable toolsets allow us to meet rising demand with lower financial risk while preserving the artistry of human-crafted content.

Our F.E.L.T. system is designed for cross-platform scale from the start, allowing IP holders to easily produce interactive and linear content with one asset pipeline; delivering new forms of entertainment that meet audiences wherever they are — from traditional screens to interactive platforms, social networks and beyond.
preamble: The Next Generation of Tech-Augmented Content Production Studio

name: Schemata
description: We empower teams to create, visualize, and interact with high-quality 3D environments faster and more cost-effectively than ever before. With proven traction—$3.6M in revenue, multiple defense and commercial partnerships, and industry awards—Traverse is leading the democratization of AI-driven 3D simulation and is positioned to deliver applications across sectors such as defense, oil and gas, and infrastructure.
preamble: Virtual Training and Simulation for Defense and Enterprise

name: Sekai
description:
Building the next TikTok for interactive content using AI. Like how TikTok started from lip-sync videos, we are starting with anime fan fiction.

We are team of TikTok veterans and we are seeing a once in a generation opportunity. TikTok turned reality into short videos; AI is transforming anything you can imagine into interactive content.

What you imagine is what you get.
preamble: What You Imagine is What You get.

name: Shockwave
description: We’re harnessing AI and decades of gaming expertise to create the ultimate destination for daily play!  Daily games are a massive opportunity in the 50B+ casual gaming market. They are subscription driven business, with universal appeal to gamers and non gamers alike. With hundreds of millions of players hits like Wordle have popularized the daily game. We are building games across more categories more genres and new interactive experiences to expand and win this market!
preamble: Building the AI powered game platform for the masses! With $2.3 million in revenue, 180k DAU and a pipeline of new games we are at the intersection of (AI and Play).

name: Sitch
description: Tired of dating apps & the endless swiping? Conversations that go nowhere? Meeting randos at bars? Maybe you need your very own matchmaker. Sitch uses AI + Humans to provide a custom Matchmaking experience which is far more intimate than swiping apps.
preamble: Sitch Sets You Up - using AI powered Matchmaking, Sitch helps you find your person.

name: Sloyd
description:
Sloyd is on a mission to create the ultimate 3D creation platform, enabling creators to make 3D assets fast and easy. 

Our core differentiation is optimized, usable 3D objects that are instantly customizable. We are the only infrastructure that can do in-game creation, enabling User Generated Content on a new scale. 

Our webapp allows quick editing of 3D templates using AI prompting, or with simple sliders and toggles. Users can access hundreds of templates to customize 3D assets. They can also upload an image and generate 3D models directly.
