preamble: Sloyd is a platform where creators can generate 3D models fast and in a easy way.

name: Sonatic
description: a desktop assistant that observes your screen, learns how you work, and then does it for you.
preamble: an interface for to-do to done in seconds!

name: Soundmap
description: Soundmap is the hottest social music app right now with 1.8m+ lifetime downloads in 6 months :)
preamble: Top 5 in Music on the App Store :)

name: Sourcerer
description:
Sourcerer is the world’s first fully autonomous AI procurement agent. We help distributors automate their entire sourcing process, from identifying suppliers and negotiating prices, to managing freight and credit terms, all through a single intelligent platform.

Using proprietary AI technology, Sourcerer analyzes product needs, tariff exposure, supplier networks, and logistics constraints to instantly generate optimized sourcing recommendations. Our customers save time, reduce costs, and unlock access to high-quality manufacturers across Asia, Latin America, and the U.S.

Our vision is to simplify global trade by empowering buyers with AI that delivers transparency, cost savings, and unmatched efficiency across the supply chain. By combining procurement, logistics, and trade finance into one intelligent engine, we’re building the application layer of the autonomous supply chain.
preamble: Sourcerer is building the autonomous supply chain that is already helping customers save millions of dollars and thousands of hours.

name: Spark Space
description:
Spark Space: The AI Writing Tutor That Truly Connects with Students
Students LOVE Spark Space because it feels like a real tutor who understands them—their interests, their struggles, and their passions. More than just an AI, it bonds with them like a friend, making writing feel personal, engaging, and even fun. With a gamified experience inspired by Duolingo and their favorite video games, students see instant progress, keeping them motivated and excited to improve. And most importantly, Spark Space helps them get better at writing, giving immediate feedback so they can build confidence and earn higher grades.

Teachers LOVE Spark Space because it makes students actually excited to write. The AI tutor provides powerful insights into student writing, helping teachers focus on what matters most. And with automated draft grading, it saves hours of time—allowing teachers to spend less time grading and more time inspiring their students.
preamble: Helping teachers and students use AI to enhance learning

name: Spekter Games
description:
Web3 features can supercharge retention, monetization, and virality, but have failed to translate to mainstream gamer adoption. 

Web3 games have struggled to attract mainstream gamers due to two key issues: friction in onboarding, and Web3 incentive designs that take  the fun out of the games. 

To reduce friction, we are publishing our games on chase-based super apps such as Telegram. Telegram is massive, and they have been quietly launching features that allow us to run our games directly on Telegram, enabling seamless game distribution, payments, and crypto wallet adoption. 

At Spekter Games, we’re launching full-featured Web2 games on Telegram, starting with rogue-lite games. Our approach delivers top-tier gameplay that appeals to traditional gamers while keeping Web3 elements passive and seamless.

The gaming industry is massive, and the opportunity to blend Web2 and Web3 the right way can be explosive. We have the right team to do this, and we are ready to lead this revolution.
preamble: The Future of Gaming is on Super Apps. Spekter Games is a next-gen game publisher on Telegram blending Web2 and Web3 features to supercharge monetization and retention at massive scale.

name: Story Engine Inc.
description: We are reinventing webcomics and anime with AI. Anime & webcomics is a $70B market where per 1 second of animation takes 8 hand drawn panels & many hours. By turning every webcomic episode into a bite sized, animated, immersive anime video with AI, we are building a new medium of storytelling.
preamble: AI Native Anime & Webtoons for Gen Z.

name: Sunflower
description:
Addiction is one of the great problems humanity faces, there are literally billions of humans locked behind their addictions being prevented from achieving their true potential. 

We're building the ultimate toolkit to help keep you sober. Sunflower combines Visual Progression Tracking, an AI Sponsor, CBT-based journaling exercises, and world-class educational content. 

For the first time thanks to AI - technology is capable of being more powerful than a human therapist or sponsor. 

Our product has already helped keep tens of thousands of people sober, supporting over 3,000,000+ days of sobriety, and saving countless lives. 

We're going to build the worlds most effective solution to addiction, and then we're going to put it into the hands of a billion people.
preamble: We're building an AI-enabled toolkit to keep you sober, for the 1.2 billion humans who struggle with addiction.

name: SuperGaming
description:
Our Studios Vision has Always been Building Games that People Play for Years. 
We specialize in making realtime multiplayers shooters and have over 200 million installs. 
Our latest title Indus is currently launched in India with over 15 Million Pre Registrations and launches Globally in 2025.
preamble: Building India's Gaming Revolution

name: SweatPals
description:
We are turning every corner of the world into a social fitness community.
Since COVID reshaped how we stay active, grassroots fitness movements - run clubs, sports leagues, and community-led workouts - have been popping up everywhere. SweatPals is the marketplace built just for them: think of us as the “Airbnb for fitness,” empowering anyone to create, host, and monetize their own fitness community. For members to discover and join communities most suited to them.

Over the past 12 months, we’ve grown to 3,000+ hosts and 200,000 members, reaching $10M in annualized GMV this year - a 14x YoY growth. 

We believe the future of fitness isn’t locked in studios, but rather fueled by decentralized, community community-driven experiences.
preamble: We are turning every corner of the world into a social fitness community.

name: TaleMonster Games
description: We are a full-stack founding team that started working together 5 years ago at Peak Games. This time, we’re going beyond what we achieved with Toon Blast. We’re combining the best of casual game engagement with mid-core game monetization. We developed our first game, Match Valley, in just 5 months with just 5 founders. We soft-launched it last month and it already has 72 minutes of average session time!
preamble: Redefining what casual means in mobile gaming

name: Talofa Games
description: Talofa is building Roblox for Fitness. Our platform makes it simple for creators to develop fitness games for Gen Z. The flagship game on the platform, Run Legends, has over 400,000 downloads and has been featured multiple times on the Apple App Store and Google Play Store. Talofa’s team has been built up with game veterans from EA, 2K, and Riot Games and the CEO, Jenny Xu, has created mobile games with over 10M downloads.
preamble: Talofa is building Roblox for Fitness. Our platform makes it simple for creators to develop fitness games for Gen Z.

name: Talus Robotics
description:
Traditional seeing-eye guide dogs cost around $80,000—leaving over 99% of those who need them without access. At Talus Robotics, our mission is to transform this reality and champion independence and inclusion for the blind and visually impaired. We’ve developed groundbreaking robotic guide dogs that cost under $5,000, delivering unprecedented freedom, safety, and empowerment to those who’ve long been underserved.

After that, we're tackling adjacent markets in elder care and emotional support.

One day we're building a world full of robot pets and companions, outside and in the home - a future where robotics enrich every aspect of our social lives, living with us and building lifelong relationships.
preamble: One day robot pets. Right now robot guide dogs for the blind - empowering them to navigate their world safely, independently, and confidently.

name: TapTap Live
description:
We modernize timeless, classic games for Gen Z. Starting with trivia!

TapTap Trivia
1. Play with the NATION in our daily live trivia game

2. Play with your CAMPUS by starting a 1v1 battle anytime

3. Play as fast as CULTURE CHANGES, thanks to our AI content engine 
(fresh questions from 100+ news sources every day)
preamble: Next generation social games 💛 starting with TapTap Trivia (played by 100K+ Gen Z college students)

name: Taya
description: Wearables today are gadgets. We believe they should be jewelry. Taya is a design-led wearable company founded by ex-Apple engineers and Stanford Product Design grads, creating jewelry-grade hardware that makes AI feel personal, beautiful, and effortless to wear. Our first product brings AI off the screen and into everyday life as a living memory layer, capturing experiences in real time, turning them into a searchable, contextual timeline, and evolving into intelligence that anticipates your future. This is not just a wearable; it’s a new category of computing: the world’s first AI-native memory layer - private by default, socially acceptable, and built by a team that knows how to ship products at Apple scale.
preamble: AI you'll actually want to wear, built by ex-Apple, Stanford

name: The Possible Company
description:
The Possible Studio is a moviemaking app that starts with writing, trusted by bloggers and newsletter writers to elevate their writing. We use AI to help storytellers augment their narrative with images, video, voiceover, sound effects and more.

The company is led by Co-founder & CEO Phil Chacko, who previously led product management for XR at Unity. Co-founder & CTO Venk Subramanian was a VP of Engineering at Unity and has built applications in E-commerce, social media, and more.
preamble: Turn your story into a short, animated movie in minutes. Resurrect old blogs, augment your Substack, or prototype your movie pitch.

name: Torbie
description: Torbie is a newly formed game studio by industry veterans in the heart of Seattle. We share a passion for cooperative and systemic games that spark discovery and exploration. We strive to build games that create emotion and can connect people through play.
preamble: Crafting worlds, connecting hearts

name: Tractive
description: Tractive is building AI-powered tools for 3D artists to get assets game-ready 10x faster, by using machine learning to automate tasks like mesh retopology, UV unwrapping, and rigging.
preamble: 10x faster game-ready 3D assets

name: Trass Games
description:
Trass Games is a nimble and fast-paced game studio dedicated to crafting hit social VR experiences, including Yeeps.

Officially founded in 2021 by Jack, Nathan, and Steve, the studio’s origins trace back to 2015 when Jack and Nathan met as high school freshmen, bonding over a shared passion for building unique games. Together, they developed over 30 titles across mobile and PC before becoming captivated by VR in 2019. Since then, they’ve been at the forefront of this emerging medium, pushing boundaries alongside the Trass Games team to become one of the most respected developers in the space.

Today, Trass Games is focused on expanding Yeeps into a full-fledged UGC platform, drawing inspiration from Minecraft and Roblox. Their ambition: to be the first to truly get it right in VR—creating a Yeeps metaverse that stands the test of time.
preamble: Trass Games is building the next-generation social UGC platform in VR with Yeeps—a top 10 Meta Quest game that blends the creativity of Minecraft and Roblox with the energy of Gorilla Tag.

name: trophi.ai
description:
Imagine having a world-class coach guiding you in real-time, whether you're racing in a simulator, perfecting Rocket League mechanics, or even mastering real-world skills like surgery, aircraft piloting, or welding. At trophi.ai, we’ve built a flexible AI native coaching platform that delivers elite, personalized feedback at a fraction of the cost of human coaching. Our AI observes activities, analyzes decisions, and provides real-time, expert-level insights—redefining how people learn and improve.

AI coaching is the future, and we are building the infrastructure to power it. In 10 years, trophi.ai will be the backbone of coaching across gaming, simulations, and real-world applications. Our vision is to enable everyone—from individual prosumers to global enterprises—to create and deploy expert AI coaches for any skill, unlocking mastery at scale.
preamble: trophi.ai is building the AI coaching revolution—an expert coach for any skill, available anytime, anywhere.

name: Unbound Technologies
description:
We have developed a revolutionary 3D creation engine that allows anyone to craft their imagination. Unbound drops 20+ year-old architectural assumptions that make today's 3D tools too laborious beyond professional use. Designed with fundamentally new building blocks, Unbound offers unprecedented creator control and is engineered from the ground up for seamless human-AI collaboration.

Since launching in early access in January 2025, Unbound has been enthusiastically embraced by our growing community of over 3,600+ passionate creators. With an average session time of 2 hours, our users have validated that our fundamental paradigm shift enables an unprecedented simplicity in 3D creation tools.

While we see immediate opportunities from our community to monetize our creation tools, we are confident that we now have the foundation to build our dream of a "YouTube for 3D". This platform will enable billions of people to create, share, and remix games and interactive 3D content at web-scale.
preamble: Unbound is bringing interactive 3D content into the era of spontaneous creation.

name: Unleashed Games
description: Unleashed Games is a disruptive new consumer startup creating innovative, socially-driven games that bring people together. Built by a team responsible for mega hits like World of Warcraft, Medal of Honor, and Monopoly Go!, we are delivering Haven, a cross-platform, collaborative RPG. Our mission is to address the loneliness crisis through meaningful connections in gaming, tapping into an underserved audience of female gamers and gamer parents with a family-friendly adventure generator. Unleashed Games is positioned to redefine gaming for modern audiences.
preamble: Making Games that Bring People Together

name: URSA Mining
description: At URSA, we're developing a universal, physically intelligent operating system for mining equipment. With our system, mines can transform their existing fleets into autonomous earth-moving robots, boosting revenue and increasing efficiency. Our team consists of world-leading experts in physical AI, robotics, and tele-operations. Founded by a second-generation miner and former particle physicist, URSA is on a mission to build the world's first fully autonomous mine.
preamble: We're making autonomous mines a reality.

name: Uthana
description:
Uthana is a generative AI platform for 3D character animation. By removing the tedium from generating realistic motion (e.g retargeting, stylized locomotion, looping and blending, making files work across tools), we enable content creators to animate characters in minutes, not days or weeks. 

Our mission is to beat a visual Turing test for human motion and bring a new level of creativity and authenticity to synthetic movement. 

Ultimately, we’re aiming to transform game play by powering real-time, novel motion in response to narration, environment, and character intent.
preamble: Foundational models for human motion.

name: Valor
description: Valor is on a mission to help military service members and their families connect with local businesses that support their service through military discounts.
preamble: Building the next consumer financial platform for 40m+ heroes

name: Variant
description: Our proprietary AI models and design systems transform memes, jokes, fanfics, or even office drama into shareable interactive games. Variant is to interactive media what Facebook is for text, what Reddit is for GIFS, and what Tiktok is for videos.
preamble: Variant is the Social Platform for Playable Content that tells stories the internet hasn't seen before.

name: Vega
description:
Vega: AI-Powered Social Orbits

On Vega, you leave notes about friends to unlock notes about yourself. Our models analyze these notes to generate AI-powered social orbits, hyper-curated groups of people who will change your life, surfaced with perfect context like mutuals, trust, and shared experiences.

We’re building the largest textual data moat on human relationships by gamifying the way people leave notes for each other. For the first time, LLMs can analyze millions of raw, human-written notes at scale and turn them into structured meaning, powering the most annotated social graph ever created.

Magic is other people. Orbit the people who matter!
preamble: Vega: AI-powered social orbits

name: videogame.ai
description: 100% automation is coming to every industry. We believe games will be the first. We've built a vast agent infrastructure modeled after the game production pipeline and we've added AI agents for every specialty required to make games. Our agents work 24/7. As we speak, our AI agents are building games.
preamble: A fully autonomous game studio where AI agents work

name: Voidpet
description: Collect all the Voidpets in our mobile RPG game.
preamble: Emotion Monsters

name: VRL
description: VRL develops viral mobile games. The team previously created NGL (#1 on the App Store, 200M+ downloads, $20M in ARR)
preamble: Games that go viral

name: Waveful
description:
Waveful is the first AI social app where adult people can freely share their passions, build authentic communities and actually monetize their content.

Thanks to AI powered features and algorithms, it's much easier to create and find communities for what you like, and find the right people for you. Making it possible for adult people to become influencers for the first time.

We've grown to over 1M MAUs and $200K of monthly revenue in under a week.
preamble: We're building Reddit 2.0, grown to 1M+ MAU in the last week

name: Windwalk
description: We build enterprise community solutions for the largest fandoms. Teams deploy Harbor to supercharge their community strategies by building their ultimate gamified homebase. Harbor unifies disparate online communities allowing marketing teams to drive explosive growth, and collect meaningful social data to better inform campaigns.
preamble: Own your community data and unlock growth and monetization.

name: YKB
description:
Speculation is becoming how people engage with culture. Betting & prediction markets are exploding. But they’re built for gamblers, not fans.

Our unlock = Receipts: interactive prompts generated by our agent when news breaks. Fans react, predict, & compete together.  1M+ Receipts created since May. 100k+ Receipts created in the last week. In beta, starting in sports — expanding to all areas of culture.

We’re building the social layer for fans that betting & prediction markets are missing. We believe tapping into this fan energy will bring speculation beyond just gamblers, to a billion people.
preamble: The social layer for fans that prediction markets are missing

name: Zero Billion
description: Zero Billion is creating BookTok, the fastest growing AI TV show platform. Shows are made in under 1 hour for <$10/min. Already Top 10 on iOS in our category with $2M+ annualized revenue.
preamble: Fastest growing AI TV show platform. $2M annualized revenue.

name: Zibra AI
description:
An AI-powered platform that brings all aspects of 3D content creation and visual effects into one cohesive ecosystem. This setup eliminates the need for multiple tools, allowing creators to move seamlessly from concept to final render. 
In traditional workflows, artists must switch between various specialized tools for modeling (Maya, Blender, Zbrush, 3ds Max, Cinema 4D), texturing (Substance, Quixel, Photoshop) animation (Maya, Blender, Houdini) and effects creation (Houdini, EmberGen, After Effects, Nuke), each with its own export-import processes. Not only does this take time, but it can also lead to compatibility issues, file corruption, and constant reassembly, especially in game engines like Unity or Unreal.
preamble: Zibra builds an AI-powered platform that brings all aspects of 3D content creation and visual effects into one cohesive ecosystem

name: Zingroll
description:
Zingroll is where creative 20-year olds become Walt Disney's of tomorrow by streaming their Netflix-quality AI-shows/movies to the rest of the world. This is the future of Netflix and streaming at-large. 
We all scroll Netflix but fail to find stuff to watch, and then finally settle on whatever is relatively watchable. Zingroll changes this forever. Come talk to us!
preamble: World's largest Netflix-quality AI (movies/series) streaming platform with 85M+ organic views, weekly viral releases, and a team of 33 world-class people.
